actions.name: Fungal Infection

cost.trigger: The user hits at least one creature with a [Contact] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user hits at least one creature with a [Contact] attack.
Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 10% chance to be afflicted with @Affliction[leech] 5.

system.description:
